EmailTemplate.description: FFN or LFCCP No Show Somali
EmailTemplate.name: FFN / LFCCP / Training No Show (Somali)
EmailTemplate.subject: Missed training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Ku {!CampaignMember.FirstName},
Sida uu muujinaayo diinwaankeena, ma aadan imaanin tababarka {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Name__c} aad isku qortay taariikhda {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Start_DateTime__c}. Fadlan booqo https://imaginewa.org/training/ haddii aad rabtid inaad isku qorto fasal ka duwan.
-The Imagine Institute
www.imaginewa.org
{!$Setup.c501_cm__Imagine_Settings__c.c501_cm__Email_SMS_Unsub_Text__c}
